summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2587, for the improvement of 7th Avenue West from West McGraw Street to West Blaine Street; West Blaine Street from 7th Avenue West to 8th Avenue West; 8th Avenue West from West Blaine Street to West Highland Drive, all of said streets being part of Queen Anne Boulevard; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers and side sewers therein, together with necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 30210 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
